title.@value: Mixed urinary incontinence associated with pelvic organ prolapse

definition.@value: A condition of the urinary system, caused by detrusor overactivity and impaired urethral function. This condition is characterised by a mix of stress and urge incontinence symptoms including involuntary loss of urine, urinary urgency, urinary frequency, or urinary incontinence when coughing, laughing, sneezing, exercising, or other physical activities that increase intra-abdominal pressure.

label.@value: Mixed urinary incontinence associated with pelvic organ prolapse
